insert into t_publish_plan(id, plan_name, customer_id, name, type, group_name, version_id, version_name, des, create_time) values(#{id}, #{planName}, #{customerId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{groupName}, #{versionId}, #{versionName}, #{des}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: update t_publish_plan set plan_name = #{planName}, name=#{name}, type = #{type}, group_name = #{groupName}, version_id = #{versionId}, version_name = #{versionName}, des = #{des} where id = #{id}
update t_publish_plan set dev_count=#{devCount}, finish_count = #{finishCount}, not_finish_count = #{notFinishCount} where id = #{id}

update t_publish_plan set status = 'Y' where id = #{id}
update t_publish_plan set check_status = #{checkStatus} where id = #{id}
